```{r}

omega_values = read.table("G:/My Drive/Circadian Rhythm Genes Project/21.Omega_value_results/3.Clock_omega/omega_all.csv", header = T, sep = ",")
omega_values$Gene <- factor(omega_values$Gene, levels = unique(omega_values$Gene))
ggplot(omega_values, aes(as.factor(Gene),Omega, col = Gene))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA)+
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1,size = 2)+
  labs(x = "Clock Genes", y = "Omega (dN/dS)")+
  theme_cowplot(12)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1), legend.position = "none")
```
